mask().Description: The mask to apply to the original value.

name().Description: The String to use in place of the original int value.

outputIf().Description: Indicates whether to output the flag when the test is true, or false. Defaults to true.

equals().Description: The value to compare to the result of: original value & mask().

ClassDesc: Defines a mapping from a flag to a String. Such a mapping can be used in an @ExportedProperty to provide more meaningful values to the end user.
